column4: Whenever i try to install/upgrade ANYTHING it tried to install wine 1.2 and fails, giving me this error: Errors were encountered while processing: /var/cache/apt/archives/wine1.2_1.1.42-0ubuntu4_amd64.deb Can anyone PLEASE help? I've been wresting with this for over an hour!
only relevent thing on the forums said to use synaptic to fix broken packages, but that does nothing.
remove the file, do an update and try again?
did you try to purge the package an try again?
the purge command ended up giving me this error http://pastebin.org/439294
hmmm. ls: cannot access /var/cache/debconf: No such file or directory
sudo mkdir /var/cache/debconf && sudo apt-get install --reinstall -f debconf
well it didnt stop at wine 1.2 that time, right now its building the man page database
that only told me that there is one package not upgraded
you may want to install debsums and run it to see what more you're missing
